tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Many business owners find that their staff lack sufficient interpersional skills such as the ability to cooperate their coworkers. What are the causes? Can you suggest some possible solutions?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
